channel.title: Daily India News
channel.description: Your daily AI-generated executive briefing covering Top India News, Polity, Law, Economy, Environment, Foreign Policy, Technology, Sports, and Health & Science.

item.title: Feb 26, 2026
item.description: India's economy shows robust growth while PM Modi strengthens ties with Israel, signaling a foreign policy shift. Domestically, the Supreme Court makes key rulings on defamation and education, and AI continues to reshape India's tech landscape.
